channel.title: Account banned
channel.description:
Like 4 days ago my main account got perma banned but they just sent me a message saying that i got a seven day. heres the appeal if anyone want to use it:
[b]I've never macroed in my life. There was a person who gave me lots of iron and he was level 3 so he might have given me macroed iron. My record isnt spotless because I was trying to tell some of my friends a fansite that gives you guides and maps but i was not advertising it. I really like runescape, I even bought a membership. I was playing with my friends at a fort we built so i couldn't[/b]

item.title: Account banned
item.dc:creator: @Emp Emp
item.description:
@Emp wrote:

Lol Runescape added a system so now if you do use your 1 appeal and you use another one a bot will automatically decline you:( really sucks:(

Read full topic
